questions.question: How often does Old Faithful erupt?
questions.info: Old Faithful erupts every 35 to 120 minutes for 1 1/2 to 5 minutes. Its maximum height ranges from 90 to 184 feet.

questions.question: When was the Old Faithful Inn built?
questions.info: The Old Faithful Inn is one of the last log hotels present in the United States and is seven stories high.

questions.question: On average, how long does it take for Old Faithful to reach maxium height once it starts erupting?
In 2013, Our Amazing Planet reported that Old Faithful's plumbing is most similar to which instrument?
questions.info: This research helped discredit the thinking that geysers are fed from long, narrow tubes.
